fitnesse:run-tests

Full name:

uk.co.javahelp.fitnesse:fitnesse-launcher-maven-plugin:1.4.0:run-tests

Description:

Goal that launches FitNesse tests using fitnesse.junit.TestHelper. Intended to be bound to the 'integration-test' phase.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: test.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: integration-test.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
reportsDir File - This is where reports go.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/fitnesse/reports.
User property is: fitnesse.reports.
resultsDir File - This is where test results go.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/fitnesse/results.
User property is: fitnesse.results.
summaryFile File - The summary file to write integration test results to.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/fitnesse/results/failsafe-summary.xml.
User property is: fitnesse.summary.file.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
createSymLink boolean - fitnesse-launcher-maven-plugin unpacks a fresh copy of FitNesse under /target; Only your project specific FitNesse tests need go under src/test/fitnesse. By setting 'createSymLink' to 'true', fitnesse-launcher-maven-plugin will create a FitNesse SymLink directly to your test suite under src/test/fitnesse. This is most useful when developing tests in 'wiki' mode, as then you can directly scm commit your changes. If you prefer to copy-resources from src/test/fitnesse into /target/fitnesse, let 'createSymLink' be 'false'.
Default value is: true.
User property is: fitnesse.createSymLink.
excludeOptionalDependencies boolean - Should fitnesse-launcher-maven-plugin exclude optional transitive dependencies, when configured using <useProjectDependencies> ?
Note: This may result in duplicates or conflicts for transitive dependencies.
See Issue #27.
Defaults to true.
@Deprecated
Default value is: true.
User property is: fitnesse.excludeOptionalDependencies.
excludeSuiteFilter String - (no description)
User property is: fitnesse.excludeSuiteFilter.
failIfNoTests Boolean - (no description)
Default value is: true.
User property is: fitnesse.failIfNoTests.
launches Launch[] - (no description)
User property is: fitnesse.launches.
logDir String - (no description)
User property is: fitnesse.logDir.
port Integer - (no description)
Default value is: 9123.
User property is: fitnesse.port.
root String - (no description)
Default value is: FitNesseRoot.
User property is: fitnesse.root.
runTestsMatchingAllTags String - (no description)
User property is: fitnesse.runTestsMatchingAllTags.
suite String - (no description)
User property is: fitnesse.suite.
suiteFilter String - (no description)
User property is: fitnesse.suiteFilter.
test String - (no description)
User property is: fitnesse.test.
testResourceDirectory String - (no description)
Default value is: src/test/fitnesse.
User property is: fitnesse.test.resource.directory.
useProjectDependencies Set - (no description)
User property is: fitnesse.useProjectDependencies.
workingDir String - (no description)
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/fitnesse.
User property is: fitnesse.working.

Parameter Details

createSymLink:

fitnesse-launcher-maven-plugin unpacks a fresh copy of FitNesse under /target; Only your project specific FitNesse tests need go under src/test/fitnesse. By setting 'createSymLink' to 'true', fitnesse-launcher-maven-plugin will create a FitNesse SymLink directly to your test suite under src/test/fitnesse. This is most useful when developing tests in 'wiki' mode, as then you can directly scm commit your changes. If you prefer to copy-resources from src/test/fitnesse into /target/fitnesse, let 'createSymLink' be 'false'.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: fitnesse.createSymLink
  • Default: true

excludeOptionalDependencies:

Should fitnesse-launcher-maven-plugin exclude optional transitive dependencies, when configured using <useProjectDependencies> ?
Note: This may result in duplicates or conflicts for transitive dependencies.
See Issue #27.
Defaults to true.
@Deprecated
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: fitnesse.excludeOptionalDependencies
  • Default: true

excludeSuiteFilter:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: fitnesse.excludeSuiteFilter

failIfNoTests:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.Boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: fitnesse.failIfNoTests
  • Default: true

launches:

(no description)
  • Type: uk.co.javahelp.maven.plugin.fitnesse.mojo.Launch[]
  • Required: No
  • User Property: fitnesse.launches

logDir:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: fitnesse.logDir

port:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.Integer
  • Required: No
  • User Property: fitnesse.port
  • Default: 9123

reportsDir:

This is where reports go.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: fitnesse.reports
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/fitnesse/reports

resultsDir:

This is where test results go.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: fitnesse.results
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/fitnesse/results

root:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: fitnesse.root
  • Default: FitNesseRoot

runTestsMatchingAllTags:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: fitnesse.runTestsMatchingAllTags

suite:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: fitnesse.suite

suiteFilter:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: fitnesse.suiteFilter

summaryFile:

The summary file to write integration test results to.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: fitnesse.summary.file
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/fitnesse/results/failsafe-summary.xml

test:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: fitnesse.test

testResourceDirectory:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: fitnesse.test.resource.directory
  • Default: src/test/fitnesse

useProjectDependencies:

(no description)
  • Type: java.util.Set
  • Required: No
  • User Property: fitnesse.useProjectDependencies

workingDir:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: fitnesse.working
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/fitnesse
